channel.title: Comments on: Begone, Virtual Pit Bosses!

item.title: By: UnionCarbide
item.dc:creator: UnionCarbide
item.description: Because they are a nuisance and a customer service nightmare.
item.content:encoded: Because they are a nuisance and a customer service nightmare.

item.title: By: Chef
item.dc:creator: Chef
item.description: That sucks. Why kill casinos without putting in "real" ones?
item.content:encoded: That sucks. Why kill casinos without putting in “real” ones?

item.title: By: Foton of AFKGamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFKGamer
item.description: That must be the director's cut. I sure don't remember Boromir saying that. Something about "kiss me, Aragorn" but that was it.
item.content:encoded: That must be the director’s cut. I sure don’t remember Boromir saying that. Something about “kiss me, Aragorn” but that was it.

item.title: By: UnionCarbide
item.dc:creator: UnionCarbide
item.description: To quote Boromir: Stick that in your hairless, flaccid assholes, and tell em BOROMIR sent ya!
item.content:encoded: To quote Boromir: Stick that in your hairless, flaccid assholes, and tell em BOROMIR sent ya!
